Smart Scanner

One gadget, two uses

Connect to phone app via bluetooth/USB

Beacon equippted

Water-Resistant & durability minded design
Scan Mode: Scan microchip number
Walking Mode: Verify that pets are really taken out for walk
Medical Mode: Pull and add medical records
Check-in Mode: Event and business check-in
Beacon Mode: Proximity marketing
In-and-Out Mode: Animal inventory management

Beacon

Beacon is a wireless transmitter using low-energy bluetooth to send signals to other smart devices nearby.

By using our Beacon Equipped Scanner you can send messages to nearby devices as a marketing tool. Also in emergencies, as when a natural disaster occurs.

Message & Alerts

Suita Sports facility is accepting up to 40 housholds with pets.

  • Hospital questionnaire & waiting time.

  • Pet related infomation in airports & public facilities.

One Account
Multiple Scanners

You can manage all the acitivities by scanners that are associated with your account.

Pet Owners get notifications right away when someone scanned his/her pets. (when, where, who)
Pet Owners can contact with a person who scanned a microchip impanted in their pet.
Pet Owners can report when their pet is lost.

service comparison &

Why Pet Stamp

Pet Stamp service not only provides value when pets get lost, but it also provides value on an ongoing basis from when welcoming them as new family member.

We will use machine learning and AI (artificial intelligence) to interpret human and pet needs, give them better supports.

whatever your needs are

We got you covered

We got you    covered

Pet Owner

From keeping a health log, booking the best groomer in town, or finding your lost pet
Pet Stamp can assist you with anything that you & your pet needs.

Shelter

Using our scanner and database, a quick scan will reveal the owner of stray pets with a microchip.
Also enable wider communication for adoption & recruiting volunteers.

Breeder

Easy log-keeping & easy-transactions for your business.
Through log-keeping can also raise your in-app rating as a business.

Veterinarian

A quick scan from the microchip will provide any shared medical records.
Our e-Vet chatting services can also open a new line of communication with potencial costumers.

Pet Store

Scan & access our database for any shared information about your new arriving animals.
Use our platform to market your business local and national.

Other Pet Related Businesses

Groomer, pet hotels, dog walkers, pet food, toys, training...
whatever your business is, as long as about pets, we can help you market in our platform.

Perks Service

Pet Community

The most common reason for pet abandonment is financial. We will support pets and owners by providing special offers and services.

Businesses

Premium users are accesible to the complete marketing tool for grow your business & generate new customers.

about us & the

Team behind it

We are a San Fraicosco based start-up building a pet registry & Smart Microchip Scanner to support pets and owners.

We provide sevices, support and infomation for not giving up pets.

We help individual pet owners to find new homes for pets before bring in to the rescues and animal organizations for abandonment.
Raise the reunion rate.
This makes it possible to save more dogs and cats that are being killed in shelters.
